art_style_engine.visual_aesthetic: Dark Minimalist with Neon Accents / Cyber-grunge

color_grading.tonal_contrast: High contrast; bright emissive elements against a near-black matte surface
color_grading.color_temperature: Neutral-cold UI with a warm orange floor reflection in the background

environment_physics.light_source_type: Digital screen-space emission for UI; ambient warm light from the floor below
environment_physics.shadow_properties: No cast shadows on UI; subtle ambient occlusion in the background scene
environment_physics.special_fx: Bloom/Glow effect on the lime-green elements; red particle embers in the background
environment_physics.background_material: Rough low-poly surface with a satin orange finish (floor)

material_fidelity.primary_surface_reflection: Matte UI container with zero specularity; subtle gloss on the background floor
material_fidelity.transparency_and_refraction: Opaque UI background with slight edge-blurring/anti-aliasing
material_fidelity.micro_texture_details: Digital noise/grain visible on the dark container surface

composition_logic.camera_angle: Straight-on orthographic for UI; low-angle perspective for background world
composition_logic.visual_balance: Asymmetrical; text-heavy on the left, status progress (1/1) anchored to the right

ui_and_graphics_system.graphic_overlays: Thin horizontal accent bar in the top right corner

typography_dna.font_family_feel: Handwritten / Grunge Sans-serif (Header) and Modern Clean Sans (Body)
typography_dna.header_formatting: All-caps, light-weight, condensed handwritten style with irregular stroke widths
typography_dna.body_text_formatting: Regular weight, sentence case, high-readability sans-serif in off-white (#E0E0E0)
typography_dna.typesetting_rules: Tight leading; wide tracking on the header to enhance the 'sketchy' feel

emissive_properties.glow_intensity: Soft glow on the #D9FF70 elements to simulate a neon light effect
emissive_properties.text_luminance: High luminance for the header to ensure visibility against dark background
